trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> property to determine which row changed.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>변경 된 행을 결정 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which row state changed.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>행 상태를 확인 하려면 속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.

This constructor uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 매개 변수 값을 사용 하 여 초기화 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> 행에서 변경 된 상태를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
Gets the state that has changed on the row.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> 행에서 변경 된 상태를 나타내는 값입니다.
